name: Shining Glass Bead
description: The glittering bead cherished by Steward Cat. You can put it into the Cat litter box.

name: Shining Holy Water
description: You ask me if Shining Holy Water can drink? Come on, this is holy water! I would not tell you that it tastes like carbonated drink without air.

name: Shinji Ikari Headwear
description: "I mustn't run away. I mustn't run away. I mustn't run away!" We all believe in you. So please don't run away any more.

name: Ship Captain Hat
description: Airship captain's hat. There's a small line wrote on the hat's brim, "please let me become a doctor".

name: Ship Captain Hat [1]
description: Airship captain's hat. There's a small line wrote on the hat's brim, "please let me become a doctor".

name: Shutter shades
description: Designed by Juno Nightingale Theater, it will make you feel like traveling by in time! Let's rewind the memory of freedom!

name: Silk Ribbon
description: An exquisite bow tie made of smooth silk. It's comfortable to wear.

name: Silk Robe
description: Clothes made of advanced cloth, with excellent M.Def.
effect: M.Def ＋20,[Tidal Shoes VI] ＋[Silk Robe VI]: Has a 10% chance to turn the target into Water target for 10 seconds during auto attacks

name: Silk Robe [1]
description: Clothes made of advanced cloth, with excellent M.Def.
effect: M.Def ＋20,[Tidal Shoes VI] ＋[Silk Robe VI]: Has a 10% chance to turn the target into Water target for 10 seconds during auto attacks

name: Silver Bell
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [The past time, the snowy sky rang with the bell of happiness, This is part of the first memories of the world. Do you still remember?]

name: Silver Medal
description: Silver medal, collecting 40 medals allows you to enter guild Valhalla Ruins. You can obtain through completing Guild Quest, Mission Board, Rift, Monster Resistance, Training Grounds and Endless Tower.

name: Silver Robe
description: A fine robe made of Mithril silver, a dazzling item shining magic rhymes.
effect: INT ＋5,[Silver Robe] ＋ [Statue of Archangel IV]: M.Atk ＋12%
